content: **little cottage** is a pattern for very quick home decorative project you may knit it both for yourself and as a gift **yarn needed** drops karisma no 72 about 5 - 7 metres drops karisma no 60 about 5 metres or two contrast colours of any dk yarn a little bit of black thread for window embroidery **materials needed** double pointed needles size 2 5 durning needle stitch marker twine little carabiner decorative pendant
